overview: Join globe-trotting bunny Buster Baxter as he hops across America embarking on adventures, making new friends and exploring other cultures in this charming show aimed at grammar schoolers. The four-episode collection includes a trip to Virginia Beach, Va., in "Buster's League of Champions"; a stopover in Winchester, Ky., in "Best Friends"; a visit to Chicago in "A Sense of Direction"; and a Pacific Northwest sojourn in "Sleepy in Seattle."
title: Postcards from Buster: Buster's Buddies
